::Hot Rod::
   
  Hot Rod was looking over the sensor consols in the Atlantis Maximal Command Center when he started to pick up a faint signal on his comm system. It was directed on a personal channel. He knew it had to be Nightlight. Something was wrong.
   
  Hot Rod: I might have a lead guys. I'm going to go check it out. I'll check in.
   
  Hot Rod leaves the room and eventually the base. He heads for a shuttle port in car mode.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras/Perceptor:

Hydras hide him and the clone and send a comlink to PErceptor.

Perceptor received the call and sent a faint signal that fakes 
Nightlight�s com link attempt to Rodimus private channels. It was so 
faint that just hinted that she was far a way and was impossible to 
detect it's true origins

>
> ::Jhiaxus/Scorponok-Zarak::
> 
> The two leave the shuttle. Jhiaxus takes some cover in a near 
marsh area. He hides deep in the weeds.
> 
> Scorponok changes to scorpion mode and Zarak gets into the 
cockpit. The scorpion form burrows under the ground.
>
